name: Poems and Rhymes for Kids Learning
name_original: Poems and Rhymes for Kids Learning
description:
Poems and Rhymes for Kids Learning includes Urdu and English alphabets, numeric symbols, songs for toddlers, geometric shapes, coloring and painting, kids games with puzzles and much more in a single app. Cartoon videos which can be played offline as well as they are totally free and can be used anywhere at any time.

Poems and Rhymes for Kids Learning contain poems which are handpicked for children so that they don’t get bored of it. Babies can also enjoy ABC song, phonics letter tracing and much more in a single app.
